form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Title: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE\nForm Number: A10 179 278

full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/28/2023 Form G-135b Agency Name Check (Rev. 8-1-60) UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE District Immigration and Naturalization Service File No. A10 179 278 Chicago Sub-office Date 4/29/61 dbp NAME (Surname in CAPS, First, Middle) DATE OF BIRTH SEX COLOR MARITAL March 16,1901 F STATUS TUAN Mei-LING Yen PLACE OF BIRTH (City, province or state PRESENT NATIONALITY S M Ankiu Shantung & Chica China D W ALIASES (Identify maiden name or nicknames) PARENTS' NAMES (Include present address, if known) HEIGHT WEIGHT EYES 5'1" 140 Brown Gray HAIR COMPLEXION IDENTIFYING MARKS OR SCARS RESIDENCE LAST FIVE YEARS (Street No., RFD . etc.) (City, state and country) Tougaloo College, Tougaloo, Miss. FROM5/55 TO 5/57 9/57 8/58 1131 Summit St., Ft. Wayne, Ind. 1134 Summit St., Ft. Wayne, Ind. 8/58 8/59 9/59 Present 446 West Pierce St., Macomb, Ill.
